attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Criminals should be punished but it should be made simple,we should know this crime means this sentence!Any premeditated murder results in the Death Penalty.Any attempted murder results in the Death Penalty/life imprisonment.Paedophiles convicted of abusing children results in the Death Penalty.Any attacks on a Police/Fire Service/Nurses/Doctors/Teachers start with an minimum 2 years imprisonment with no chance of parole.Anyone guilty of causing injury using a Gun/Knife/Lethal Weapon should be tried as attempted murder.Anyone carrying a Gun/Knife/Lethal Weapon should be sentenced to 7 years in Prison with no chance of parole.Anyone found guilty of stealing should be sentenced to 2 years imprisonment.Repeat offenders should have sentences doubled on each occasion.Anyone found guilty of rape face life imprisonment/the death penalty.Drink Drive limits should be altered to 0, you can not drive after alcohol.Guilty of drink driving you face 5 years imprisonment.The age limit for drinking should be 21.Anti-social behaviour should result in a minimum 2 years imprisonment.A prison is for punishment it must reflect this fact.
